content: संयत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Restrained, curbed, subdued. {@--2@} Tied up, bound together. {@--3@} Fettered. {@--4@} Captive, imprisoned, a prisoner; <ls>R. 3. 20.</ls> {@--5@} Ready. {@--6@} Arranged; see यम् with सं. --तः {@--1@} One who has restrained his passions, an ascetic. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva.
